timeline.title: 1.Input Your Ingredients
timeline.desc: Simply enter the ingredients you have on hand and let our AI do the rest.

timeline.title: 2.Get Recipe Suggestions
timeline.desc: Our AI analyzes your ingredients and suggests a variety of delicious recipes.

timeline.title: 3.Start Cooking
timeline.desc: Follow the step-by-step instructions to create dishes with ease.

accordion.title: What is CookBot? How does it work?
accordion.desc: CookBot is an AI-powered platform that analyzes your available ingredients and suggests delightful dishes. Just input what you have, and our AI will generate personalized recipes for you!

accordion.title: What kind of recipes can I get?
accordion.desc: CookBot offers a wide range of recipes, from appetizers to desserts. Whether you're in the mood for something quick and easy or looking to try a new cuisine, we've got you covered.

accordion.title: Can I trust the nutritional information provided?
accordion.desc: Yes, CookBot provides accurate nutritional information for every recipe, helping you make informed choices about your meals.

accordion.title: Is this AI a high school project?
accordion.desc: Yes, CookBot was developed as part of a high school initiative. We're proud of our student team for creating such a useful tool.

accordion.title: Is my data safe with CookBot?
accordion.desc: Absolutely! We prioritize your privacy and ensure that your data is secure and only used to improve your experience.

accordion.title: Is CookBot available in multiple languages?
accordion.desc: No, CookBot does not support multiple languages, only English.
